about_the_game:
The OFFICIAL TOURNAMENTS and STADIA pack includes:

  • The Roland-Garros tournament with the Philippe-Chatrier, Suzanne-Lenglen and Simonne-Mathieu stadiums
  • The main court of the Madrid Open, the Estadio Manolo Santana
  • The main court of the Halle Open, the OWL ARENA
  • The Tie Break Tens tournament
detailed_description:
The OFFICIAL TOURNAMENTS and STADIA pack includes:

  • The Roland-Garros tournament with the Philippe-Chatrier, Suzanne-Lenglen and Simonne-Mathieu stadiums
  • The main court of the Madrid Open, the Estadio Manolo Santana
  • The main court of the Halle Open, the OWL ARENA
  • The Tie Break Tens tournament

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650, 3.2 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHz | AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

short_description: The OFFICIAL TOURNAMENTS and STADIA pack includes the Roland-Garros tournament with the Philippe-Chatrier, Suzanne-Lenglen and Simonne-Mathieu stadiums; the Estadio Manolo Santana, the main court of the Madrid Open; the OWL Arena, the main court of the Halle Open, and the Tie Break Tens tournament.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
